name: DuetHero by David Youd
description:
DuetHero

Author: David Youd

Platform: Commodore VIC-20 (unexpanded)

Language: Commodore BASIC V2.0

Category: PUR-120

Inspired by Guitar Hero, DuetHero is a game in which you and your VIC-20 play Bach music together.  24 keys on your keyboard are now piano keys.  You play the treble, and the VIC-20 plays the bass.  Fail to play a note when required, and the game ends.  Trainer mode available for practicing the entire song.

13-page manual: http://youdzone.com/c64/duethero.pdf

covering:

- game setup for both real and emulated play

- gameplay

- a sheetmusic "walkthrough" solution

- detailed program description, and

- proof of PUR-120 compliance

Game: http://youdzone.com/c64/duethero

Disk image containing the game: http://youdzone.com/c64/duethero.d64
